'''Illageralt''' is an unused [[font]] {{in|je}}, which is based on the [[MCD:illageralt|font of the same name]] from {{MCD}}.

== Definition ==
This is a "secret" font not used anywhere in the game. It is a reference to [[Illageralt]], a ''Minecraft Dungeons'' rune-like alphabet. It can be used only with the {{code|"font"}} [[Raw JSON text format|JSON text]] key.{{note|For example, {{code|{"text": "Here and there", "font": "illageralt"} }}}}

It references {{cd|asciillager.png}}.

== Supported characters ==
; {{cd|asciillager.png}}

This is a near-exact mirror of the [[MCD:Illageralt|rune-like font]] used {{in|MCD}}.

{{Collapse|title=List of characters (ordered)|content=
<pre>
!,-.0123456789?a
bcdefghijklmnopq
rstuvwxyzABCDEFG
HIJKLMNOPQRSTUVW
XYZ             
</pre>
}}
